text: Læa h̄ā kxạllxḥˌ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ næ̀nxn ca thrng thảh̄ı̂ phwk k̄heā pĕn prachāchāti deīywkạn tæ̀ phraxngkh̒ ca thrng h̄ı̂ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ k̄hêā s̄ū̀ khwām mettā k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ s̄̀wn brrdā p̄hū̂ xṭhrrm nận phwk k̄heā mị̀mī p̄hū̂ khûmkhrxng læa mị̀mī p̄hū̂ ch̀wyh̄elụ̄x
